Package Battle.GeneralBattle

Class FightAirship

java.lang.Object
Battle.GeneralBattle.FightAirship
public class FightAirship extends Object
This class is used to create FightAirship which are copy of the airships from the management part.

  • Constructor Details

    • FightAirship

      public FightAirship​(Airship airship, boolean ally)
      Creates an instance of FightAirship by copying the properties useful for combat of the argument airship.
      Parameters:
      airship - the original airship
      ally - the property of a FightAirship which the player controls

  • Method Details

    • udpateCanMove

      public void udpateCanMove​(int turn)
      Updates the property canMove of the airship.
      By comparing the current turn and the turn of the last move with the speed of this airship, the function decides each turn if the airship can realise a movement.
      Parameters:
      turn - the current turn of the battle
